languages.text: {n}Арджента удовлетворенно смахивает пот со лба.{/n} "Славно потрудились, {name}! Здоровое тело подобно ладному болтеру — достойный инструмент Его воли. Оставлю тебя, нам обоим не помешает отдых".
languages.translation_comment:
Стоп анимаций. Игрок садится обратно
Арджента уходит через зтм

Стоп анимаций. Игрок садится обратно
Арджента уходит через зтм

languages.text: {n}Argenta wipes the sweat from her brow with an air of satisfaction.{/n} "Good work, {name}! A healthy body is like a finely-tuned bolter — a worthy instrument of His will. I will take my leave now. Rest, and recover your strength."
languages.original_text: {n}Арджента удовлетворенно смахивает пот со лба.{/n} "Славно потрудились, {name}! Здоровое тело подобно ладному болтеру — достойный инструмент Его воли. Оставлю тебя, нам обоим не помешает отдых".

traits.locale_text: {n}Satisfied, Argenta wipes the sweat from her brow.{/n} "We've done good work, {name}! A healthy body is akin to a well-maintained bolter — a worthy instrument of His will. I will leave you so that we can both restore our strength."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Satisfied, Argenta wipes the sweat from her brow.{/n} "We've done good work, {name}! A healthy body is akin to a well-maintained bolter — a worthy instrument of His will. I will leave you so that we can both restore our strength."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta wipes the sweat from her brow with an air of satisfaction.{/n} "Good work, {name}! A healthy body is like a finely-tuned bolter — a worthy instrument of His will. I will take my leave now. Rest, and recover your strength."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta essuie la sueur de son front en affichant un air satisfait.{/n} « Beau travail, {name} ! Un corps sain est comme un bolter parfaitement calibré : un digne instrument de la volonté de l'Empereur. Sur ce, je vais prendre congé. Reposez-vous pour recouvrer vos forces. »
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wipes the sweat from her brow with an air of satisfaction.{/n} "Good work, {name}! A healthy body is like a finely-tuned bolter — a worthy instrument of His will. I will take my leave now. Rest, and recover your strength."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta essuie la sueur de son front en affichant un air satisfait.{/n} « Beau travail, {name} ! Un corps sain est comme un bolter parfaitement calibré : un digne instrument de la volonté de l'Empereur. Sur ce, je vais prendre congé. Reposez-vous pour recouvrer vos forces. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta se seca el sudor de la frente con actitud satisfecha.{/n} «¡Bien hecho, {name}! Un cuerpo sano es como un bólter bien ajustado: un digno instrumento de Su voluntad. Es hora de que me marche. Descanse y recupere fuerzas».
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wipes the sweat from her brow with an air of satisfaction.{/n} "Good work, {name}! A healthy body is like a finely-tuned bolter — a worthy instrument of His will. I will take my leave now. Rest, and recover your strength."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta se seca el sudor de la frente con actitud satisfecha.{/n} «¡Bien hecho, {name}! Un cuerpo sano es como un bólter bien ajustado: un digno instrumento de Su voluntad. Es hora de que me marche. Descanse y recupere fuerzas».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿洁塔带着满意的表情，擦掉了额头上的汗水。{/n}“干得漂亮，{name}！强壮的身体就像精心维护过的爆矢枪一样，是履行帝皇意志的得力工具。我准备走了，好好休息一下，恢复体力吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wipes the sweat from her brow with an air of satisfaction.{/n} "Good work, {name}! A healthy body is like a finely-tuned bolter — a worthy instrument of His will. I will take my leave now. Rest, and recover your strength."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿洁塔带着满意的表情，擦掉了额头上的汗水。{/n}“干得漂亮，{name}！强壮的身体就像精心维护过的爆矢枪一样，是履行帝皇意志的得力工具。我准备走了，好好休息一下，恢复体力吧。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}アルジェンタは満足げに眉から汗を拭きとった。{/n}「よくやった{name}！健康な肉体は、精巧に調整されたボルターのようなものだ。私はこれで失礼する。ゆっくり休んで、体力を回復してください」
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wipes the sweat from her brow with an air of satisfaction.{/n} "Good work, {name}! A healthy body is like a finely-tuned bolter — a worthy instrument of His will. I will take my leave now. Rest, and recover your strength."

traits.locale_text: {n}アルジェンタは満足げに眉から汗を拭きとった。{/n}「よくやった{name}！健康な肉体は、精巧に調整されたボルターのようなものだ。私はこれで失礼する。ゆっくり休んで、体力を回復してください」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta wischt sich mit einem zufriedenen Gesichtsausdruck den Schweiß von der Braue.{/n} "Gute Arbeit, {name}! Ein gesunder Körper ist wie ein perfekt kalibrierter Bolter — ein Instrument das seines Willens würdig ist. Ich verabschiede mich nun. Ruht Euch aus und kommt wieder zu Kräften."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wipes the sweat from her brow with an air of satisfaction.{/n} "Good work, {name}! A healthy body is like a finely-tuned bolter — a worthy instrument of His will. I will take my leave now. Rest, and recover your strength."

traits.locale_text: {n}Argenta wischt sich mit einem zufriedenen Gesichtsausdruck den Schweiß von der Braue.{/n} "Gute Arbeit, {name}! Ein gesunder Körper ist wie ein perfekt kalibrierter Bolter — ein Instrument das seines Willens würdig ist. Ich verabschiede mich nun. Ruht Euch aus und kommt wieder zu Kräften."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Argenta, tatmin olmuş bir edayla kaşlarındaki teri siliyor.{/n} "İyi çalışmaydı {name}! Sağlıklı bir beden; iyi kalibre edilmiş bir bulonatar gibidir, O'nun iradesini sergileyebileceğimiz bir araçtır. Gitme vaktim geldi. Dinlen ve gücünü geri kazan."
languages.original_text: {n}Argenta wipes the sweat from her brow with an air of satisfaction.{/n} "Good work, {name}! A healthy body is like a finely-tuned bolter — a worthy instrument of His will. I will take my leave now. Rest, and recover your strength."
